name: Supercross Unfolded
description:
Early prototype.

Coming Soon

  • Brake Tuning
  • Suspension Tuning
  • Traction Assist
  • Seat Bounce Tuning
  • Misc Physics Tuning
  • Camera Settings

Coming Not So Soon

  • Multiple Tracks, with menu selection
  • Custom Track Editor
  • Rider
    • First Person View

Update Log

  • 2019-01-16
    • Slight Number Tuning
    • Added Engine and Transmission Settings UI
      • Changes do not persist between sessions

Controls

  • Throttle: Bottom right corner. Drag.
  • Rear Brake: Above throttle. Press and Hold
  • Front Brake: Bottom left corner. Press and Hold
  • Seat Bounce: Above Front Brake. Press and Hold
  • Shift: Above Seat Bounce. Swipe Up/Down
  • Lean: Tilt Device
